task.title: How to find locators by Id
task.shortdesc: Locators can be found with many possible ways. One of them is by Id which is the most reliable one.

prereq.p: Read how to create locator variables.

context.p: You will find out how to find locators by id :

step.cmd: Go to the dom in the web site and search for the id of the given web element
Use lambda => after the locator's name or =
Use the command driver.FindBy(By.id()) after the lambda
Put the id into the By.id brackets

result.p: You will be able to perform action on the locator
